desc: Sophie's Soaps sell handmade sustainable bath and body products like shampoo bars, conditioner bars, soap, lip balm, bubble dough, bath salts, shaving soap, and solid lotion bars. 100% eco friendly, plastic free, and palm oil free. All orders are shipped through An Post and packaged in recyclable cardboard boxes.

layout.text: Handmade Artisan Soap & Luscious Skin Care
Treat yourself to some bathroom luxury with a beautiful bar of handmade soap, some luscious lip butter, or a sudsy shampoo bar.
